flawed_nl_solution:
He can lift 135+265=<<135+265=400>>400 pound without the bracer
The bracer adds 400*6=<<400*6=2400>>2400 pounds
So he can now squat 2400+400=<<2400+400=2080>>2080 pounds
#### 2080

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2800, not 2080. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
